verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8140><s%> year חֲדָ֗ה <S%H2298><s%> In the first לְבֵלְאשַׁצַּר֙ <S%H1113><s%> of Belshazzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4430><s%> king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H895><s%> of Babylon דָּנִיֵּאל֙ <S%H1841><s%> Daniel חֵ֣לֶם <S%H2493><s%> a dream חֲזָ֔ה <S%H2370><s%> had וְחֶזְוֵ֥י <S%H2376><s%> and visions רֵאשֵׁ֖הּ <S%H7217><s%> of his head עַֽל־ <S%H5922><s%> upon מִשְׁכְּבֵ֑הּ <S%H4903><s%> his bed בֵּאדַ֙יִן֙ <S%H116><s%> then חֶלְמָ֣א <S%H2493><s%> the dream כְתַ֔ב <S%H3790><s%> he wrote רֵ֥אשׁ <S%H7217><s%> the sum מִלִּ֖ין <S%H4406><s%> of the matters אֲמַֽר׃ <S%H560><s%> [and] told

עָנֵ֤ה <S%H6032><s%> spake דָנִיֵּאל֙ <S%H1841><s%> Daniel וְאָמַ֔ר <S%H560><s%> and said חָזֵ֥ה <S%H2370><s%> was looking הֲוֵ֛ית <S%H1934><s%> in בְּחֶזְוִ֖י <S%H2376><s%> in my vision עִם־ <S%H5974><s%> by לֵֽילְיָ֑א <S%H3916><s%> night וַאֲר֗וּ <S%H718><s%> and behold אַרְבַּע֙ <S%H703><s%> the four רוּחֵ֣י <S%H7308><s%> winds שְׁמַיָּ֔א <S%H8065><s%> of the heaven מְגִיחָ֖ן <S%H1519><s%> strove לְיַמָּ֥א <S%H3221><s%> sea רַבָּֽא׃ <S%H7229><s%> upon the great

וְאַרְבַּ֤ע <S%H703><s%> And four חֵיוָן֙ <S%H2423><s%> beasts רַבְרְבָ֔ן <S%H7260><s%> great סָלְקָ֖ן <S%H5559><s%> came up מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from יַמָּ֑א <S%H3221><s%> the sea שָׁנְיָ֖ן <S%H8133><s%> diverse דָּ֥א <S%H1668><s%> one מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from דָּֽא׃ <S%H1668><s%> another

קַדְמָיְתָ֣א <S%H6933><s%> The first כְאַרְיֵ֔ה <S%H744><s%> [was] like a lion וְגַפִּ֥ין <S%H1611><s%> wings דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch נְשַׁ֖ר <S%H5403><s%> and had eagle's לַ֑הּ חָזֵ֣ה <S%H2370><s%> looking הֲוֵ֡ית <S%H1934><s%> kept עַד֩ <S%H5705><s%> till דִּי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch מְּרִ֨יטוּ <S%H4804><s%> thereof were plucked גַפַּ֜יהּ <S%H1611><s%> the wings וּנְטִ֣ילַת <S%H5191><s%> and it was lifted up מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from אַרְעָ֗א <S%H772><s%> the earth וְעַל־ <S%H5922><s%> upon רַגְלַ֙יִן֙ <S%H7271><s%> the feet כֶּאֱנָ֣שׁ <S%H606><s%> as a man הֳקִימַ֔ת <S%H6966><s%> and made stand וּלְבַ֥ב <S%H3825><s%> heart אֱנָ֖שׁ <S%H606><s%> and a man's יְהִ֥יב <S%H3052><s%> was given לַֽהּ׃

וַאֲר֣וּ <S%H718><s%> And behold חֵיוָה֩ <S%H2423><s%> beast אָחֳרִ֨י <S%H317><s%> another תִנְיָנָ֜ה <S%H8578><s%> a second דָּמְיָ֣ה <S%H1821><s%> like לְדֹ֗ב <S%H1678><s%> to a bear וְלִשְׂטַר־ <S%H7859><s%> side חַד֙ <S%H2298><s%> itself on one הֳקִמַ֔ת <S%H6966><s%> and it raised up וּתְלָ֥ת <S%H8532><s%> and [it had] three עִלְעִ֛ין <S%H5967><s%> ribs בְּפֻמַּ֖הּ <S%H6433><s%> in the mouth בֵּ֣ין <S%H997><s%> of it between [שִׁנַּיַּהּ כ] (שִׁנַּ֑הּ <S%H8128><s%> tooth ק) וְכֵן֙ <S%H3652><s%> thus אָמְרִ֣ין <S%H560><s%> of it and they said לַ֔הּ ק֥וּמִֽי <S%H6966><s%> unto it Arise אֲכֻ֖לִי <S%H399><s%> devour בְּשַׂ֥ר <S%H1321><s%> flesh שַׂגִּֽיא׃ <S%H7690><s%> much

בָּאתַ֨ר <S%H870><s%> After דְּנָ֜ה <S%H1836><s%> this חָזֵ֣ה <S%H2370><s%> looking הֲוֵ֗ית <S%H1934><s%> kept וַאֲר֤וּ <S%H718><s%> and lo אָֽחֳרִי֙ <S%H317><s%> another כִּנְמַ֔ר <S%H5245><s%> like a leopard וְלַ֨הּ גַּפִּ֥ין <S%H1611><s%> wings אַרְבַּ֛ע <S%H703><s%> of it four דִּי־ <S%H1768><s%> which ע֖וֹף <S%H5776><s%> of a fowl עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> which had upon [גַּבַּיַּהּ כ] (גַּבַּ֑הּ <S%H1355><s%> back ק) וְאַרְבְּעָ֤ה <S%H703><s%> had also four רֵאשִׁין֙ <S%H7217><s%> heads לְחֵ֣יוְתָ֔א <S%H2423><s%> the beast וְשָׁלְטָ֖ן <S%H7985><s%> and dominion יְהִ֥יב <S%H3052><s%> was given לַֽהּ׃

בָּאתַ֣ר <S%H870><s%> After דְּנָה֩ <S%H1836><s%> this חָזֵ֨ה <S%H2370><s%> looking הֲוֵ֜ית <S%H1934><s%> kept בְּחֶזְוֵ֣י <S%H2376><s%> visions לֵֽילְיָ֗א <S%H3916><s%> in the night וַאֲר֣וּ <S%H718><s%> and behold חֵיוָ֣ה <S%H2423><s%> beast [רְבִיעָיָה כ] (רְֽבִיעָאָ֡ה <S%H7244><s%> fourth ק) דְּחִילָה֩ <S%H1763><s%> dreadful וְאֵֽימְתָנִ֨י <S%H574><s%> and terrible וְתַקִּיפָ֜א <S%H8624><s%> and strong יַתִּ֗ירָא <S%H3493><s%> exceedingly וְשִׁנַּ֨יִן <S%H8128><s%> teeth דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch פַרְזֶ֥ל <S%H6523><s%> iron לַהּ֙ רַבְרְבָ֔ן <S%H7260><s%> and it had great אָֽכְלָ֣ה <S%H399><s%> it devoured וּמַדֱּקָ֔ה <S%H1855><s%> and brake in pieces וּשְׁאָרָ֖א <S%H7606><s%> the residue [בְּרַגְלַיַּהּ כ] (בְּרַגְלַ֣הּ <S%H7271><s%> foot ק) רָפְסָ֑ה <S%H7512><s%> and stamped וְהִ֣יא <S%H1932><s%> of it and it מְשַׁנְּיָ֗ה <S%H8133><s%> [was] diverse מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> all חֵֽיוָתָא֙ <S%H2423><s%> the beasts דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> that קָֽדָמַ֔יהּ <S%H6925><s%> that [were] before וְקַרְנַ֥יִן <S%H7162><s%> horns עֲשַׂ֖ר <S%H6236><s%> it and it had ten לַֽהּ׃

מִשְׂתַּכַּ֨ל <S%H7920><s%> was contemplating הֲוֵ֜ית <S%H1934><s%> become בְּקַרְנַיָּ֗א <S%H7162><s%> the horns וַ֠אֲלוּ <S%H431><s%> and behold קֶ֣רֶן <S%H7162><s%> horn אָחֳרִ֤י <S%H317><s%> them another זְעֵירָה֙ <S%H2192><s%> little סִלְקָ֣ת <S%H5559><s%> there came up [בֵּינֵיהֹון כ] (בֵּֽינֵיהֵ֔ן <S%H997><s%> among ק) וּתְלָ֗ת <S%H8532><s%> whom there were three מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> of קַרְנַיָּא֙ <S%H7162><s%> horns קַדְמָ֣יָתָ֔א <S%H6933><s%> the first [אֶתְעֲקַרוּ כ] (אֶתְעֲקַ֖רָה <S%H6132><s%> pluck up by the roots ק) מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> according [קֳדָמַיַּהּ כ] (קֳדָמַ֑הּ <S%H6925><s%> before ק) וַאֲל֨וּ <S%H431><s%> and behold עַיְנִ֜ין <S%H5870><s%> [were] eyes כְּעַיְנֵ֤י <S%H5870><s%> like the eyes אֲנָשָׁא֙ <S%H606><s%> of man בְּקַרְנָא־ <S%H7162><s%> horn דָ֔א <S%H1668><s%> in this וּפֻ֖ם <S%H6433><s%> and a mouth מְמַלִּ֥ל <S%H4449><s%> speaking רַבְרְבָֽן׃ <S%H7260><s%> great things

חָזֵ֣ה <S%H2370><s%> looking הֲוֵ֗ית <S%H1934><s%> kept עַ֣ד <S%H5705><s%> till דִּ֤י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch כָרְסָוָן֙ <S%H3764><s%> the thrones רְמִ֔יו <S%H7412><s%> were cast down וְעַתִּ֥יק <S%H6268><s%> and the Ancient יוֹמִ֖ין <S%H3118><s%> of days יְתִ֑ב <S%H3488><s%> did sit לְבוּשֵׁ֣הּ ׀ <S%H3831><s%> whose garment כִּתְלַ֣ג <S%H8517><s%> as snow חִוָּ֗ר <S%H2358><s%> [was] white וּשְׂעַ֤ר <S%H8177><s%> and the hair רֵאשֵׁהּ֙ <S%H7217><s%> of his head כַּעֲמַ֣ר <S%H6015><s%> wool נְקֵ֔א <S%H5343><s%> like the pure כָּרְסְיֵהּ֙ <S%H3764><s%> his throne שְׁבִיבִ֣ין <S%H7631><s%> flame דִּי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch נ֔וּר <S%H5135><s%> [was like] the fiery גַּלְגִּלּ֖וֹהִי <S%H1535><s%> [and] his wheels נ֥וּר <S%H5135><s%> fire דָּלִֽק׃ <S%H1815><s%> [as] burning

נְהַ֣ר <S%H5103><s%> stream דִּי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch נ֗וּר <S%H5135><s%> A fiery נָגֵ֤ד <S%H5047><s%> issued וְנָפֵק֙ <S%H5312><s%> and came forth מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from קֳדָמ֔וֹהִי <S%H6925><s%> before אֶ֤לֶף <S%H506><s%> him thousand [אַלְפַיִם כ] (אַלְפִין֙ <S%H506><s%> Thousands ק) יְשַׁמְּשׁוּנֵּ֔הּ <S%H8120><s%> ministered וְרִבּ֥וֹ <S%H7240><s%> unto him and ten thousand [רַבְּוָן כ] (רִבְבָ֖ן <S%H7240><s%> and myriads ק) קָֽדָמ֣וֹהִי <S%H6925><s%> before יְקוּמ֑וּן <S%H6966><s%> stood דִּינָ֥א <S%H1780><s%> him the judgment יְתִ֖ב <S%H3488><s%> was set וְסִפְרִ֥ין <S%H5609><s%> and the books פְּתִֽיחוּ׃ <S%H6606><s%> were opened

חָזֵ֣ה <S%H2370><s%> looking הֲוֵ֔ית <S%H1934><s%> kept בֵּאדַ֗יִן <S%H116><s%> then מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> because קָל֙ <S%H7032><s%> of the voice מִלַּיָּ֣א <S%H4406><s%> words רַבְרְבָתָ֔א <S%H7260><s%> of the great דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> which קַרְנָ֖א <S%H7162><s%> which the horn מְמַלֱּלָ֑ה <S%H4449><s%> spake חָזֵ֣ה <S%H2370><s%> looking הֲוֵ֡ית <S%H1934><s%> kept עַד֩ <S%H5705><s%> [even] till דִּ֨י <S%H1768><s%> which קְטִילַ֤ת <S%H6992><s%> was slain חֵֽיוְתָא֙ <S%H2423><s%> the beast וְהוּבַ֣ד <S%H7><s%> destroyed גִּשְׁמַ֔הּ <S%H1655><s%> and his body וִיהִיבַ֖ת <S%H3052><s%> and given לִיקֵדַ֥ת <S%H3346><s%> to the burning אֶשָּֽׁא׃ <S%H785><s%> flame

וּשְׁאָר֙ <S%H7606><s%> As concerning the rest חֵֽיוָתָ֔א <S%H2423><s%> of the beasts הֶעְדִּ֖יו <S%H5709><s%> taken away שָׁלְטָנְה֑וֹן <S%H7985><s%> they had their dominion וְאַרְכָ֧ה <S%H754><s%> an extension בְחַיִּ֛ין <S%H2417><s%> yet their lives יְהִ֥יבַת <S%H3052><s%> were prolonged לְה֖וֹן עַד־ <S%H5705><s%> for זְמַ֥ן <S%H2166><s%> a season וְעִדָּֽן׃ <S%H5732><s%> and time

חָזֵ֤ה <S%H2370><s%> looking הֲוֵית֙ <S%H1934><s%> kept בְּחֶזְוֵ֣י <S%H2376><s%> visions לֵֽילְיָ֔א <S%H3916><s%> in the night וַאֲרוּ֙ <S%H718><s%> and behold עִם־ <S%H5974><s%> with עֲנָנֵ֣י <S%H6050><s%> the clouds שְׁמַיָּ֔א <S%H8065><s%> of heaven כְּבַ֥ר <S%H1247><s%> [one] like the Son אֱנָ֖שׁ <S%H606><s%> of man אָתֵ֣ה <S%H858><s%> came הֲוָ֑ה <S%H1934><s%> kept וְעַד־ <S%H5705><s%> to עַתִּ֤יק <S%H6268><s%> the Ancient יֽוֹמַיָּא֙ <S%H3118><s%> of days מְטָ֔ה <S%H4291><s%> and came וּקְדָמ֖וֹהִי <S%H6925><s%> before הַקְרְבֽוּהִי׃ <S%H7127><s%> and they brought him near

וְלֵ֨הּ יְהִ֤יב <S%H3052><s%> And there was given שָׁלְטָן֙ <S%H7985><s%> him dominion וִיקָ֣ר <S%H3367><s%> and glory וּמַלְכ֔וּ <S%H4437><s%> and a kingdom וְכֹ֣ל <S%H3606><s%> that all עַֽמְמַיָּ֗א <S%H5972><s%> people אֻמַיָּ֛א <S%H524><s%> nations וְלִשָּׁנַיָּ֖א <S%H3961><s%> and languages לֵ֣הּ יִפְלְח֑וּן <S%H6399><s%> should serve שָׁלְטָנֵ֞הּ <S%H7985><s%> him his dominion שָׁלְטָ֤ן <S%H7985><s%> dominion עָלַם֙ <S%H5957><s%> [is] an everlasting דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> Which לָ֣א <S%H3809><s%> which shall not יֶעְדֵּ֔ה <S%H5709><s%> pass away וּמַלְכוּתֵ֖הּ <S%H4437><s%> and his kingdom דִּי־ <S%H1768><s%> Which לָ֥א <S%H3809><s%> [that] which shall not תִתְחַבַּֽל׃ <S%H2255><s%> be destroyed פ

אֶתְכְּרִיַּ֥ת <S%H3735><s%> was grieved רוּחִ֛י <S%H7308><s%> in my spirit אֲנָ֥ה <S%H576><s%> I דָנִיֵּ֖אל <S%H1841><s%> Daniel בְּג֣וֹא <S%H1459><s%> in the midst נִדְנֶ֑ה <S%H5085><s%> of [my] body וְחֶזְוֵ֥י <S%H2376><s%> and the visions רֵאשִׁ֖י <S%H7217><s%> of my head יְבַהֲלֻנַּֽנִי׃ <S%H927><s%> troubled

קִרְבֵ֗ת <S%H7127><s%> I came near עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> unto חַד֙ <S%H2298><s%> one מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> of קָ֣אֲמַיָּ֔א <S%H6966><s%> them that stood by וְיַצִּיבָ֥א <S%H3330><s%> the truth אֶבְעֵֽא־ <S%H1156><s%> and asked מִנֵּ֖הּ <S%H4481><s%> him עַֽל־ <S%H5922><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> of all דְּנָ֑ה <S%H1836><s%> this וַאֲמַר־ <S%H560><s%> So he told לִ֕י וּפְשַׁ֥ר <S%H6591><s%> the interpretation מִלַּיָּ֖א <S%H4406><s%> of the things יְהוֹדְעִנַּֽנִי׃ <S%H3046><s%> me and made me know

אִלֵּין֙ <S%H459><s%> These חֵיוָתָ֣א <S%H2423><s%> beasts רַבְרְבָתָ֔א <S%H7260><s%> great דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> which אִנִּ֖ין <S%H581><s%> which אַרְבַּ֑ע <S%H703><s%> are four אַרְבְּעָ֥ה <S%H703><s%> [are] four מַלְכִ֖ין <S%H4430><s%> kings יְקוּמ֥וּן <S%H6966><s%> [which] shall arise מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> out of אַרְעָֽא׃ <S%H772><s%> the earth
